o check the cervix for tears or products of conception. (If products are visible, remove with a sponge
hol
ding forceps)
o gently grasp the anterior lip of the cervix with sponge holding forceps
o gently introduce the widest gauge suction cannula through cervical os, push the cannula into uterine
c
avity until it touches the fundus (max 10 cm) and pull back slightly
o attach the MVA syringe to the cannula and release the valves to transfer vacuum to the uterine cavity
o evacuate ute
